import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { icons } from '../../../../icons/icons' import styled from 'styled-components' const css = require('./MediaIcons.module.css') type TMediaIconsProps = { horizontal?: boolean vertical?: boolean } const MediaIcons: React.FunctionComponent = (props): JSX.Element => { const { horizontal = true, vertical}: TMediaIconsProps = props const containerStyles = [ css.Icons, horizontal && css.horizontal, vertical && css.vertical, ].join(' ') const iconStyles = [ css.Icon, horizontal && css.horizontal, vertical && css.vertical, ].join(' ') return (
) } export default MediaIcons
